title: Can't log in
body: So lately this week I've been trying to log in into my lol account but when I double click lol's icon doesnt open,it only appears a black screen and I can't click launch or anything else.Can anyone help me with that?What should I do?

replies.body:
Black screens in League are a key identifier of a connection issue to the server. Most of the time, these connection issues are caused by a few problematic network configurations that are local to your PC or network. As a first step, I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you continue to have connection issues after working through those steps.
